sentences.english: Put eggs into an empty pot and add in pinch of salt.
sentences.chinese: 把雞蛋放到煮鍋中，加入稍許鹽。

sentences.english: Slightly larger units can run radios and black-and-white television sets.
sentences.chinese: 稍許大一點的裝置能帶收音機和黑白電視機。

sentences.english: Have a little compassion on my nerves.
sentences.chinese: 稍許體諒一下我的神經吧。

sentences.english: The density and shape of the serrations are changed by aging.
sentences.chinese: 鋸齒密度也因時效而稍許減小。

sentences.english: The chemical composition of rainfall changes slightly as raid clouds move.
sentences.chinese: 隨着雨雲的移動，雨水的化學成分也有稍許的變化。

sentences.english: Eventually Darcy unbends a bit toward Elizabeth, and the two engage in ironic banter.
sentences.chinese: 終於，達西對伊麗莎白稍許隨和了一些，兩人也相互。

sentences.english: Elizabeth, after slightly surveying it, went to a window to enjoy its prospect.
sentences.chinese: 伊麗莎白稍許看了一下，便走到窗口欣賞風景。

sentences.english: There was a pause and a little sigh from the other end.
sentences.chinese: 稍許停了一下，我聽到她輕輕舒了口氣。

sentences.english: Almost crossed scales plus very little golden head features.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎過背和稍許的金頭特徵。

sentences.english: For a moment , I heard her with a sigh of relief .
sentences.chinese: 稍許停了一下，我聽到她輕輕舒了口氣。
